text: MNT may stand for: */mnt in Unix, directory including mount points *Medical nutrition therapy *MNT (gene), a transcription factor *Molecular nanotechnology *Mongolian tögrög, code MNT, the currency of Mongolia *Mononitrotoluene, or meta-nitrotoluene *MyNetworkTV, a television broadcast syndication service *Montserrat, by IAAF country code *11β-Methyl-19-nortestosterone, an anabolic-androgenic steroid *Maleonitriledithiolate, an anion found in compounds such as sodium maleonitriledithiolate
title: MNT
